ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Dredd has bonded the Mega-City defenders in a hit-and-run campaign to sever all Mega-Way exits from the occupied Northern sector.
Ambushed by a Nort Squad, Rogue triumphs and finding an abandoned farm gets some shut eye. Meanwhile the Nort Commanders have him located and send in their primitive G.I. to take him out.
